title: Double the header logo size

requirements.text: Increase the size of the selected header logo image at XPath /html[1]/body[1]/div[1]/div[1]/header[1]/div[1]/div[1]/img[1] to double its current rendered size by updating only that element’s sizing styles/classes (currently Tailwind className "h-8 w-8" in frontend/src/components/Header.tsx).

quotes: Can you make this bigger (double size)

acceptanceCriteria: In the app header, the FitGebit logo image renders at 2x the previous width and height (e.g., from 32x32 to 64x64).
No other elements (spacing, other icons, avatars, buttons) are modified aside from any necessary layout accommodation caused by the larger logo.
The change is implemented in frontend/src/components/Header.tsx by adjusting the selected element’s Tailwind size classes.

constraints: Apply the change ONLY to the selected element (the header logo ).
Do not modify any frontend immutable paths listed in SYSTEM_CONTEXT.
nonGoals: Changing the logo image file itself or generating new logo assets.
